General.Name: Cetc Potevio Science&Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Cetc Potevio Science&Technology Co.,Ltd. provides network communication solutions in China. The company engages in the planning and designing of mobile communication network; provision of industry-oriented private network communication, and network electronic system engineering and supervision services; manufacturing of communication/special printed circuit boards and devices. It also provides communication network systems and services; and smart city, Internet of Things, and cloud computing services; and network coverage products, including antenna, repeater, WLAN, etc. The company was formerly known as GCI Science & Technology Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: GCI Science and Technology Building, Guangzhou, China, 510310
